intro.heading: Find the Right Property in Sweden
intro.subheading: Housing options aligned with your relocation and settlement plan
intro.description:
Relocating to Sweden often becomes challenging at the housing stage. Finding the right area, understanding contracts, verifying listings, and avoiding risky arrangements requires local expertise. Sweden Relocators supports the full property journey through a secure digital portal and mobile app, allowing you to search, book, and relocate with confidence.

Whether you are moving to Sweden for work, study, family reunification, or business, our platform helps you find suitable housing that matches your timeline and goals.
coverageItems: Apartments and houses for individuals, couples, and families
Long term rental properties for permanent settlement
Short term furnished rentals for temporary stays
Properties in major cities and relocation-friendly regions across Sweden

buyOrSell.heading: Buy or Sell Property Through Authorised Real Estate Broker
buyOrSell.subheading: Secure transactions with verified and compliant handling
buyOrSell.description: All property purchases and sales facilitated through our platform are handled exclusively via authorised and registered real estate brokers in Sweden. This ensures legal compliance, transparency, and protection for both buyers and sellers, especially for international clients unfamiliar with the Swedish property system.
supportItems: Property matching based on budget, location, and objectives
Guidance through contracts, timelines, and settlement planning

shortTermRentals.heading: Short Term Furnished Rentals in Sweden
shortTermRentals.subheading: Ideal housing for newcomers and corporate stays
shortTermRentals.description: Short term furnished accommodation is often the most practical solution when arriving in Sweden. Our platform features relocation-ready furnished housing suitable for:
suitableFor: New arrivals awaiting personal number registration
Families arriving before securing long term housing
Clients transitioning between cities or employment
shortTermRentals.note: All properties are reviewed to meet practical relocation needs and local housing standards.

longTermRentals.heading: Long Term Rentals and Settlement Housing
longTermRentals.subheading: A structured transition from temporary to permanent living
longTermRentals.intro: Once you are ready to settle in Sweden, we assist with long term rental planning and guidance, including:
items: Understanding rental requirements and landlord expectations
Lease terms, notice periods, and standard clauses
Area selection based on commute, schools, and lifestyle
Move-in preparation and practical setup considerations
